data.comment: Andy Woolmer starts the match. Derby County with the kick-off in Derby.
Liam Rosenior (Derby County) is making a first substitution, with Morgan Whittaker replacing Tom Lawrence.
In the minute 45, Andy Woolmer blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Stoke with the kick-off.
Martyn Waghorn is on a sub for Morgan Whittaker for Derby County.
In the minute 69, Liam Rosenior is making the team's third substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Louie Sibley replacing Max Bird.
Jordan Cousins (Stoke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jason Knight (Derby County) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, Tom Ince is replacing Jordan Thompson for Stoke at Pride Park Stadium.
Stoke make their second substitution with Tashan Oakley-Boothe replacing Steven Fletcher.
Jordon Ibe is replacing Kamil Jozwiak for the home team.
That's full-time at Pride Park Stadium. The final score is 0-0.
Krystian Bielik (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
